title: What Does the 🤧 Sneeze Emoji Mean?

steps.title: The 🤧 can symbolize sickness.
steps.content: The 🤧 can symbolize sickness. In recent years, the 🤧 has gained even more traffic. You may see someone using this emoji alongside a 😷 emoji or 🤒 to say they’re feeling under the weather. [1] X Research source “I think I caught a cold last night 🤧🤒” “I’m sneezing non-stop! 🤧”

steps.title: A 🤧 represents all things that make you sneeze.
steps.content: A 🤧 represents all things that make you sneeze. Whether it’s allergies or a little too much pepper on your breakfast, this emoji conveys a moment of achoo! If someone uses a 🤧, they may have just sneezed. [2] X Research source “You know it’s spring when you can’t even step outside to get the mail without sneezing 🤧” “The chef used WAY too much pepper 🤧”

steps.title: The 🤧 can also convey sad emotions.
steps.content: The 🤧 can also convey sad emotions. Have you ever watched a movie and reached for the tissue box? Some people use the 🤧 to describe the feeling behind this action. If they feel like they’re going to cry or are crying, they might use this emoji to say, “I’m crying so much I need to blow my nose!” “Life is like a box of chocolates 🤧😭” “My face hurts from crying so much 🤧 That wedding was beautiful!”

steps.title: When you’re sick:
steps.content: When you’re sick: Pair a 🤧 with a 🤢 or 🤮 if you’re not feeling so good. This is a great way to tell your friends to keep their distance until you feel better. [3] X Research source “I think I have covid 🤧” “You really don’t want to come over 🤮🤧”

steps.title: When you sneeze:
steps.content: When you sneeze: Send a 🤧 if something’s tickled your nose. Maybe you’re trying to warn a friend about all the pollen outside, or have just taken a whiff of too many spices. Either way, this is a fun way to convey an achoo! via text. Who knows? Your friend may even bless you! “I forgot to take my allergy meds this morning 🤧 Don’t make the same mistake!” “Note to self, don’t sniff Montreal steak seasoning 🤧😂”

steps.title: When you’re crying:
steps.content: When you’re crying: Add a 🤧 to a text about a sappy movie or emotional moment. There’s no shame in grabbing the tissue box! Try pairing this emoji with a 😭 to emphasize the tears you’ve shed. “There was room on the door for both of them 😭🤧” “I’m just feeling really emotional right now 🤧”

steps.title: The 🤧 isn’t the only emoji feeling under the weather.
steps.content: The 🤧 isn’t the only emoji feeling under the weather. Try pairing this tissue-stuffed face with another ill emoji the next time you feel icky. Lining up your symptoms with emojis can even give your message a little extra personality. [4] X Research source 🤒 (face with thermometer) 🤮 (face vomiting) 🤕 (face with head-bandage) 😷 (face with medical mask) 🤢 (nauseated face)
